description: Directory of New York State county fairs for the current year, provided by the NYS Department of Agriculture and Markets.  The dataset includes the address and county of the fair, the fair’s begin and end dates and the website address for each fair.

metadata.attribution: New York State Department of Agriculture and Markets

name: County Fairs in New York State
